data.title: Saul Bellow – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Saul Bellow. Browse Saul Bellow’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.

Mr. Sammler's Planet

By: Saul Bellow

Narrated by: George Guidall

Length: 10 hrs and 36 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 25

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 20

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 20

Mr. Artur Sammler is, above all, a man who has lasted, from the civilized pleasures of English life in the 1920s and 30s through the war and death camps in Poland. Moving now through the chaotic and dangerous streets of New York's Upper West Side, Mr. Sammler is attentive to everything....

5 out of 5 stars

Harry Trellman doesn't belong. Not in the Chicago orphanage where he is sent by his mother, not in high school (too brainy), not even on the streets. Human attachments? Yes, he has them, but they are like everything else in his life, singular and irregular....
